#include <cstdio>




int main() {
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    #endif
    int t, n, i, j, c;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--) {
        scanf("%d", &n);
        c = 0;
        for (i = 1; i <= n; i += 1)
            for (j = 1; j < i; j += 1)
                if (i * j % (i + j) == 0) c += 1;
        printf("%d\n", c);
    }
    return 0;
}
